# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Base.Threads

function pig_latinify(word::String)::String
    if occursin(r"^[aeiou]", lowercase(word))
        return word * "ay"
    else
        for (i, letter) in enumerate(word)
            if occursin(r"[aeiou]", lowercase(letter))
                return word[i:end] * word[1:i-1] * "ay"
            end
        end
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(words::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    result = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    for i in 1:length(words)
        result[i] = Threads.@spawn pig_latinify(words[i])[]
    end
    map(fetch, result)
end
```

```julia
using Base.Threads

function pig_latinify(word::String)::String
    @assert !isempty(word) "Input string cannot be empty"
    word_lower = lowercase(word)
    if occursin(r"^[aeiou]", word_lower)
        return word * "ay"
    else
        for (i, letter) in enumerate(word_lower)
            if occursin(r"[aeiou]", letter)
                return word[i:end] * word[1:i-1] * "ay"
            end
        end
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(words::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    result = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    for i in 1:length(words)
        result[i] = Threads.@spawn pig_latinify(words[i])[]
    end
    map(fetch, result)
end
```
